【 STRONG MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVER】 Strong magnetic can keep the screws from dropping, and fixed the position of screw, in case of over drilling.
【 BENDABLE EXTENSION CABLE】 This cable can be bent, twisted and rotated at many different angles. It can be drilled into a small space, in a variety of gaps, rather than your hand, flexible installation work. Let this flexible drill bit extension tool help you solve more problems quickly.

Package Includes:630pcs car clips;1pc plastic storage box;5pcs fastener Remover Tool;10pcs Cable Ties.Please check the clips’s size,type and shape to make sure the it is the one that you need,we offer worry-free 18months warranty and friendly customer service.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $13.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 09:24:28 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Stuck removing damaged or rusty screws? No more!

With our screw extractor bits, removing stripped, painted over, rusted or rounded screws & bolts has never been easier or more efficient! With this 6 piece set, you will hardly run into a screw or bolt that can’t be extracted. Check below to see how easy it is to solve this problem:

This is how you should be removing a screw or bolt:

1.) Use the drill side to drill into the top a bit to allow the extractor to get a grip. (Burnish) Your drill should be moving the bit clockwise during this process.

2.) Then flip the tool

3.)Use the extractor (Spiral) side to remove the screw-bolt. Your drill should be moving the bit counterclockwise during this process.

HIGH QUALITY HSS

Engineered from hardened

steel, these extractor bits

are designed for troublesome

stuck screws & bolts. High

Speed Steel (HSS) is the

contractors preferred

material.

SAFE STORAGE

Your set comes in a safe,

durable storage & travel case.

GREAT GIFT

Our incredible extractor

set is the perfect gift for

professional contractors,

carpenters & construction

crews, as well as the casual

handyman or Do-It-Yourselfer

in your life!

ADDITIONAL #2 BIT

Good news! We’ve included

an additional #2 bit. This is

the most frequently used bit

in the box

6-PIECE SCREW EXTRACTOR SET – The screw extractor set(#0, #1, #2, #2, #3, #4) works with any drill and any size screw or bolt. This damaged screw extractor can remove all common sizes of damaged, stripped or broken screws.
HIGH QUALITY – This damaged screw remover tool kit is made from High-Speed Steel H.S.S 4341# , which have high hardness of 63hrc, it’s durable and easily to remove any damaged screws.
USER FRIENDLY – Two easy steps, first you just need a drill, select a bit smaller than the damaged screw and begin the extraction by using the drill bit/burnishing tip and drill down to create a clean hole (make sure to run the drill in reverse during the process). Next switch the drill bit to the extraction tip and using consistent, downward pressure (and a slow speed) allow the extraction tip to “bite” into the damaged screw, and then you can easily remove the screw.
MODERN TOOL : Keep this set in your toolbox to get the damaged screw out and your project back on track. Typically called an easy out or “EZ out”, highly suitable for various machinery repair work.
QUALITY GUARANTEE – We have carried out strict quality inspection and control on one of our broken screw adapters before they leave the factory, Your damaged screw remover set is backed by our Highest Quality Promise

This is how you should be removing a screw or bolt:

1.) Use the drill side to drill into the top a bit to allow the extractor to get a grip. (Burnish) Your drill should be moving the bit clockwise during this process.

2.) Then flip the tool

3.)Use the extractor (Spiral) side to remove the screw-bolt. Your drill should be moving the bit counterclockwise during this process.

Product Description

Remember those slap bracelets from middle school? Like you, they’re all grown up now, with grownup responsibilities like keeping all your nuts, bolts, and screws handy while you clear that weekend chore list.
SUPER STRONG – Fifteen powerful magnets in the band with breathable mesh inside to hold everything you need to help put the Handy in Handyman. Chores around the house are a lot more fun with a tool belt on your wrist!
MULTIPURPOSE – Whether Grandpa is a woodworking wizard or the world’s greatest hair stylist, the MagSnap makes a great birthday or Fathers Day present. Trust us, he’ll feel super cool holding nails and sewing pins on his new magnetic bracelet.
GREAT GIFT – Whether it’s a stocking stuffer or just looking to give a cool gadget gift. This is the perfect gift to give a husband, dad, father-in-law, DIYer, handyman, electrician, mechanic, or just that person who has everything.
INCLUDES – (1) MagSnap magnetic wrist band. One size fits most. Great gift for dads who have everything. Wrap-It Storage is a family business based in St. Paul, MN. PATENT PENDING.

Product Description

Take Control of Your Workspace and Always Find What You Need with these collapsible parts trays!

Perfect for most any use the Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4″ x 4″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized.

This 3-Piece Parts Tray Set delivers both quality plus savings that you wouldn’t get from other Tool Organizers and Magnetic Screw Trays.

WHY YOU NEED THIS TOOL:

3 Piece Collapsible Parts Trays – Blue, Red & GreenEasy to Expand and CollapseStrong Non-Marring Magnet that Holds to Almost Any Metal SurfaceEasy to Clean High-Grade Silicone ConstructionTray Dimensions Measure 4.25″ x 4.25″Expands to 2″ Tall. ¾” When CollapsedStores Your Small Tools and Items with Ease

A Versatile & Useful Tool for Any Professional or Hobbyist!

COLLAPSIBLE MAGNETIC PARTS TRAYS: The Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4.25″ x 4.25″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized
3 COLORS – SAE | METRIC | TORX: Save space and neatly organize your workspace. Every order of Sandor Collapsible Parts Trays includes 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 green parts tray so that you can easily color code nuts, bolts, tools, sockets, wrenches and more. Now you will always be able to find what you need just when you need it!
EASY TO USE. EASY TO CLEAN: Easily expands to 2” and collapses down to only ¾”. The silicone design can be easily cleaned with soap and water. Strong magnetic base holds to most metal surfaces. Perfect for hobbyists, automotive, mechanics, engineers, plumbers, carpenters, machinists, HVAC & more
REAL TOOLS. REAL QUALITY: Our automotive and machinist hand tools are tough-as-nails. Made of high-grade silicone to ensure high strength, hardness, wear, and resistance for durability. The low-profile design allows for compact and easy storage
TRUSTED BRAND! WE STAND BY OUR PRODUCTS: When others talk quality, we deliver it. That’s why we always offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. At SANDOR Tool we only use the highest quality materials in our products, and we go the extra mile to stand by our tools. Your satisfaction is our priority. It’s that simple
